name: Terminal
text:
The timeline coordinates you specified do not exist within the archive.
It is possible the record was deleted, or the path has been altered.

name: Terminal
text:
The records in the system indicated that there
were traces of a modification to the structure.
Please try again later, or until our representative is assigned to you.

What seems to be the
problem around hereâ€”

Oh, [Player].
You aren't supposed to be here.

May it be your misfortune, I will help you make your way out.
Or, you can stay. That much is up to you to choose.
